name: Logout one client
description: Connects a client and logs it in, then logs it out

commands.name: match_client_stderr
args: Client [0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12} logged in with login Ice Spice

commands.name: match_client_stderr
args: Client [0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12} logged out with login Ice Spice
